name: Edgar Olivan
title: Fullstack Developer
summary: Fullstack Developer with over 5 years of experience from Nuevo León, Mexico. Passionate about crafting cutting-edge web solutions that turn ideas into powerful digital experiences. I'm a software engineer based in Nuevo León, with 5+ years of experience in the software industry. I have worked on a variety of projects, ranging from web applications to desktop apps. I am proficient in languages such as JavaScript/TypeScript, VBScript and C#, and have experience using frameworks like ReactJs and ASP.NET.

tasks: Working as a software engineer developing production control software in multiple projects for a transnational company (Polaris). Primarily using Visual Basic, JavaScript, and C#.

Working as a Junior Developer, with a specific focus on SQL Server database management, establishing communication protocols with Atlas Copco industrial tools, and programming on SCADA software using VBScript.

education.details: Software Engineering, Design Patterns, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ASP.NET, Entity Framework, SQL Server and others.

projects.name: Annotation Tool
projects.description: Application for labeling objects in images, similar to labelme. Allows you to easily and visually create annotation datasets. Web tool for image annotation and dataset generation for computer vision model training.

projects.name: awesomeHMI
projects.description: HMI to display work instructions, process steps, visual aids, help ticket creation, product and material information, and operation times. Interface for control and monitoring of industrial processes, supporting instructions, tickets, and material visualization.

projects.name: clientDashboard
projects.description: Dashboard for devices with YOLOv8 models. View device information, upload new trainings, and manage existing models. Control panel for managing inference models and monitoring edge devices.

projects.name: clientStreaming
projects.description: Application to view YOLOv8 model execution and see real-time detections for each camera with inference stream. Live streaming of inferences and object detections across multiple cameras.

projects.name: AI Discord Bot
projects.description: Discord bot that uses Gemini 2.0 Flash to generate text responses based on user input.
